object.name: TransactionPartnerAffiliateProgram
object.description: Describes the affiliate program that issued the affiliate commission received via this transaction.
object.html_description: Describes the affiliate program that issued the affiliate commission received via this transaction.
object.rst_description: Describes the affiliate program that issued the affiliate commission received via this transaction.

annotations.description: Type of the transaction partner, always 'affiliate_program'
annotations.rst_description: Type of the transaction partner, always 'affiliate_program'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Information about the bot that sponsored the affiliate program
annotations.html_description: Optional. Information about the bot that sponsored the affiliate program
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Information about the bot that sponsored the affiliate program
annotations.name: sponsor_user

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the bot for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the affiliate program sponsor from referred users
annotations.html_description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the bot for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the affiliate program sponsor from referred users
annotations.rst_description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the bot for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the affiliate program sponsor from referred users
annotations.name: commission_per_mille
